price: It will be said, “Enter the gates of Hell, abiding therein forever.” What a terrible abode for the arrogant!
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
